articles.author: Laura Hülsemann
articles.title: Russia warns US that Ukraine will be its 'second Vietnam' - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: ‘We can’t let Putin win,’ Biden said on Wednesday.
articles.content:
The Kremlin’s spy chief Sergei Naryshkin warned the U.S. that Ukraine will turn into its “second Vietnam,” amid disagreement in Congress over funding for Kyiv. 
“Ukraine will turn into a ‘black hole… [+1154 chars]
